issue.title: [Java] Restore previous MapVector class names
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1885](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1885). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Making changes to the MapVector class was not part of refactoring plan and should not have been done in ARROW-1710.  This will restore class names to the previous state of `NullableMapVector` -> `MapVector` -> `AbstractMapVector`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1885?focusedCommentId=16277685) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1389
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1389>
